00053 static void filtrow(unsigned char *point, int x)
00054 {
00055     unsigned int c1,c2,c3,error;
00056 
00057     if (x>1) {
00058         c1 = c2 = *point;
00059         error = 2;
00060         for (x--;x>0;x--) {
00061             c3 = point[4];
00062             c1 += (c2<<1) + c3 + error;
00063             error = c1 & 3;
00064             *point = c1 >> 2;
00065             point += 4;
00066             c1=c2;
00067             c2=c3;
00068         }
00069         *point = (c1 + (c2<<1) + c2 + error) >> 2;
00070     }
00071 }
00072 
00073 static void filtrowf(float *point, int x)
00074 {
00075     float c1,c2,c3;
00076     
00077     if (x>1) {
00078         c1 = c2 = *point;
00079         for (x--;x>0;x--) {
00080             c3 = point[4];
00081             c1 += (c2 * 2) + c3;
00082             *point = 0.25f*c1;
00083             point += 4;
00084             c1=c2;
00085             c2=c3;
00086         }
00087         *point = 0.25f*(c1 + (c2 * 2) + c2);
00088     }
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 
00093 static void filtcolum(unsigned char *point, int y, int skip)
00094 {
00095     unsigned int c1,c2,c3,error;
00096     unsigned char *point2;
00097 
00098     if (y>1) {
00099         c1 = c2 = *point;
00100         point2 = point;
00101         error = 2;
00102         for (y--;y>0;y--) {
00103             point2 += skip;
00104             c3 = *point2;
00105             c1 += (c2<<1) + c3 +error;
00106             error = c1 & 3;
00107             *point = c1 >> 2;
00108             point=point2;
00109             c1=c2;
00110             c2=c3;
00111         }
00112         *point = (c1 + (c2<<1) + c2 + error) >> 2;
00113     }
00114 }
00115 
00116 static void filtcolumf(float *point, int y, int skip)
00117 {
00118     float c1,c2,c3, *point2;
00119     
00120     if (y>1) {
00121         c1 = c2 = *point;
00122         point2 = point;
00123         for (y--;y>0;y--) {
00124             point2 += skip;
00125             c3 = *point2;
00126             c1 += (c2 * 2) + c3;
00127             *point = 0.25f*c1;
00128             point=point2;
00129             c1=c2;
00130             c2=c3;
00131         }
00132         *point = 0.25f*(c1 + (c2 * 2) + c2);
00133     }
00134 }

00136 void IMB_filtery(struct ImBuf *ibuf)
00137 {
00138     unsigned char *point;
00139     float *pointf;
00140     int x, y, skip;
00141 
00142     point = (unsigned char *)ibuf->rect;
00143     pointf = ibuf->rect_float;
00144 
00145     x = ibuf->x;
00146     y = ibuf->y;
00147     skip = x<<2;
00148 
00149     for (;x>0;x--) {
00150         if (point) {
00151             if (ibuf->planes > 24) filtcolum(point,y,skip);
00152             point++;
00153             filtcolum(point,y,skip);
00154             point++;
00155             filtcolum(point,y,skip);
00156             point++;
00157             filtcolum(point,y,skip);
00158             point++;
00159         }
00160         if (pointf) {
00161             if (ibuf->planes > 24) filtcolumf(pointf,y,skip);
00162             pointf++;
00163             filtcolumf(pointf,y,skip);
00164             pointf++;
00165             filtcolumf(pointf,y,skip);
00166             pointf++;
00167             filtcolumf(pointf,y,skip);
00168             pointf++;
00169         }
00170     }
00171 }

00174 void imb_filterx(struct ImBuf *ibuf)
00175 {
00176     unsigned char *point;
00177     float *pointf;
00178     int x, y, skip;
00179 
00180     point = (unsigned char *)ibuf->rect;
00181     pointf = ibuf->rect_float;
00182 
00183     x = ibuf->x;
00184     y = ibuf->y;
00185     skip = (x<<2) - 3;
00186 
00187     for (;y>0;y--) {
00188         if (point) {
00189             if (ibuf->planes > 24) filtrow(point,x);
00190             point++;
00191             filtrow(point,x);
00192             point++;
00193             filtrow(point,x);
00194             point++;
00195             filtrow(point,x);
00196             point+=skip;
00197         }
00198         if (pointf) {
00199             if (ibuf->planes > 24) filtrowf(pointf,x);
00200             pointf++;
00201             filtrowf(pointf,x);
00202             pointf++;
00203             filtrowf(pointf,x);
00204             pointf++;
00205             filtrowf(pointf,x);
00206             pointf+=skip;
00207         }
00208     }
00209 }
00210 
00211 void IMB_filterN(ImBuf *out, ImBuf *in)
00212 {
00213     register char *row1, *row2, *row3;
00214     register char *cp, *r11, *r13, *r21, *r23, *r31, *r33;
00215     int rowlen, x, y;
00216     
00217     rowlen= in->x;
00218     
00219     for (y=0; y<in->y; y++) {
00220         /* setup rows */
00221         row2= (char*)(in->rect + y*rowlen);
00222         row1= (y == 0)? row2: row2 - 4*rowlen;
00223         row3= (y == in->y-1)? row2: row2 + 4*rowlen;
00224         
00225         cp= (char *)(out->rect + y*rowlen);
00226         
00227         for (x=0; x<rowlen; x++) {
00228             if (x == 0) {
00229                 r11 = row1;
00230                 r21 = row1;
00231                 r31 = row1;
00232             }
00233             else {
00234                 r11 = row1-4;
00235                 r21 = row1-4;
00236                 r31 = row1-4;
00237             }
00238 
00239             if (x == rowlen-1) {
00240                 r13 = row1;
00241                 r23 = row1;
00242                 r33 = row1;
00243             }
00244             else {
00245                 r13 = row1+4;
00246                 r23 = row1+4;
00247                 r33 = row1+4;
00248             }
00249 
00250             cp[0]= (r11[0] + 2*row1[0] + r13[0] + 2*r21[0] + 4*row2[0] + 2*r23[0] + r31[0] + 2*row3[0] + r33[0])>>4;
00251             cp[1]= (r11[1] + 2*row1[1] + r13[1] + 2*r21[1] + 4*row2[1] + 2*r23[1] + r31[1] + 2*row3[1] + r33[1])>>4;
00252             cp[2]= (r11[2] + 2*row1[2] + r13[2] + 2*r21[2] + 4*row2[2] + 2*r23[2] + r31[2] + 2*row3[2] + r33[2])>>4;
00253             cp[3]= (r11[3] + 2*row1[3] + r13[3] + 2*r21[3] + 4*row2[3] + 2*r23[3] + r31[3] + 2*row3[3] + r33[3])>>4;
00254             cp+=4; row1+=4; row2+=4; row3+=4;
00255         }
00256     }
00257 }
00258 
00259 void IMB_filter(struct ImBuf *ibuf)
00260 {
00261     IMB_filtery(ibuf);
00262     imb_filterx(ibuf);
00263 }

00265 void IMB_mask_filter_extend(char *mask, int width, int height)
00266 {
00267     char *row1, *row2, *row3;
00268     int rowlen, x, y;
00269     char *temprect;
00270 
00271     rowlen= width;
00272 
00273     /* make a copy, to prevent flooding */
00274     temprect= MEM_dupallocN(mask);
00275 
00276     for (y=1; y<=height; y++) {
00277         /* setup rows */
00278         row1= (char *)(temprect + (y-2)*rowlen);
00279         row2= row1 + rowlen;
00280         row3= row2 + rowlen;
00281         if (y==1)
00282             row1= row2;
00283         else if (y==height)
00284             row3= row2;
00285 
00286         for (x=0; x<rowlen; x++) {
00287             if (mask[((y-1)*rowlen)+x]==0) {
00288                 if (*row1 || *row2 || *row3 || *(row1+1) || *(row3+1) ) {
00289                     mask[((y-1)*rowlen)+x] = FILTER_MASK_MARGIN;
00290                 }
00291                 else if ((x!=rowlen-1) && (*(row1+2) || *(row2+2) || *(row3+2)) ) {
00292                     mask[((y-1)*rowlen)+x] = FILTER_MASK_MARGIN;
00293                 }
00294             }
00295 
00296             if (x!=0) {
00297                 row1++; row2++; row3++;
00298             }
00299         }
00300     }
00301 
00302     MEM_freeN(temprect);
00303 }

00305 void IMB_mask_clear(ImBuf *ibuf, char *mask, int val)
00306 {
00307     int x,y;
00308     if (ibuf->rect_float) {
00309         for (x=0; x<ibuf->x; x++) {
00310             for (y=0; y<ibuf->y; y++) {
00311                 if (mask[ibuf->x*y + x] == val) {
00312                     float *col= ibuf->rect_float + 4*(ibuf->x*y + x);
00313                     col[0] = col[1] = col[2] = col[3] = 0.0f;
00314                 }
00315             }
00316         }
00317     }
00318     else {
00319         /* char buffer */
00320         for (x=0; x<ibuf->x; x++) {
00321             for (y=0; y<ibuf->y; y++) {
00322                 if (mask[ibuf->x*y + x] == val) {
00323                     char *col= (char *)(ibuf->rect + ibuf->x*y + x);
00324                     col[0] = col[1] = col[2] = col[3] = 0;
00325                 }
00326             }
00327         }
00328     }
00329 }
00330 
00331 static int filter_make_index(const int x, const int y, const int w, const int h)
00332 {
00333     if (x<0 || x>=w || y<0 || y>=h) return -1;  /* return bad index */
00334     else return y*w+x;
00335 }
00336 
00337 static int check_pixel_assigned(const void *buffer, const char *mask, const int index, const int depth, const int is_float)
00338 {
00339     int res = 0;
00340 
00341     if (index>=0) {
00342         const int alpha_index = depth*index+(depth-1);
00343 
00344         if (mask!=NULL) {
00345             res = mask[index]!=0 ? 1 : 0;
00346         }
00347         else if ( (is_float && ((const float *) buffer)[alpha_index]!=0.0f) ||
00348                 (!is_float && ((const unsigned char *) buffer)[alpha_index]!=0) ) {
00349             res=1;
00350         }
00351     }
00352 
00353     return res;
00354 }
00355 
00356 /* if alpha is zero, it checks surrounding pixels and averages color. sets new alphas to 1.0
00357  * 
00358  * When a mask is given, only effect pixels with a mask value of 1, defined as BAKE_MASK_MARGIN in rendercore.c
00359  * */
00360 void IMB_filter_extend(struct ImBuf *ibuf, char *mask, int filter)
00361 {
00362     const int width= ibuf->x;
00363     const int height= ibuf->y;
00364     const int depth= 4;     /* always 4 channels */
00365     const int chsize= ibuf->rect_float ? sizeof(float) : sizeof(unsigned char);
00366     const int bsize= width*height*depth*chsize;
00367     const int is_float= ibuf->rect_float!=NULL;
00368     void *dstbuf= (void *) MEM_dupallocN(ibuf->rect_float ? (void *) ibuf->rect_float : (void *) ibuf->rect);
00369     char *dstmask= mask==NULL ? NULL : (char *) MEM_dupallocN(mask);
00370     void *srcbuf= ibuf->rect_float ? (void *) ibuf->rect_float : (void *) ibuf->rect;
00371     char *srcmask= mask;
00372     int cannot_early_out= 1, r, n, k, i, j, c;
00373     float weight[25];
00374 
00375     /* build a weights buffer */
00376     n= 1;
00377 
00378 #if 0
00379     k= 0;
00380     for (i = -n; i <= n; i++)
00381         for (j = -n; j <= n; j++)
00382             weight[k++] = sqrt((float) i * i + j * j);
00383 #endif
00384 
00385     weight[0]=1; weight[1]=2; weight[2]=1;
00386     weight[3]=2; weight[4]=0; weight[5]=2;
00387     weight[6]=1; weight[7]=2; weight[8]=1;
00388 
00389     /* run passes */
00390     for (r = 0; cannot_early_out == 1 && r < filter; r++) {
00391         int x, y;
00392         cannot_early_out = 0;
00393 
00394         for (y= 0; y<height; y++) {
00395             for (x= 0; x<width; x++) {
00396                 const int index= filter_make_index(x, y, width, height);
00397 
00398                 /* only update unassigned pixels */
00399                 if (!check_pixel_assigned(srcbuf, srcmask, index, depth, is_float)) {
00400                     float tmp[4];
00401                     float wsum=0;
00402                     float acc[4]={0,0,0,0};
00403                     k = 0;
00404 
00405                     if (check_pixel_assigned(srcbuf, srcmask, filter_make_index(x-1, y, width, height), depth, is_float) ||
00406                         check_pixel_assigned(srcbuf, srcmask, filter_make_index(x+1, y, width, height), depth, is_float) ||
00407                         check_pixel_assigned(srcbuf, srcmask, filter_make_index(x, y-1, width, height), depth, is_float) ||
00408                         check_pixel_assigned(srcbuf, srcmask, filter_make_index(x, y+1, width, height), depth, is_float)) {
00409                         for (i= -n; i<=n; i++) {
00410                             for (j=-n; j<=n; j++) {
00411                                 if (i != 0 || j != 0) {
00412                                     const int tmpindex= filter_make_index(x+i, y+j, width, height);
00413 
00414                                     if (check_pixel_assigned(srcbuf, srcmask, tmpindex, depth, is_float))   {
00415                                         if (is_float) {
00416                                             for (c=0; c<depth; c++)
00417                                                 tmp[c] = ((const float *) srcbuf)[depth*tmpindex+c];
00418                                         }
00419                                         else {
00420                                             for (c=0; c<depth; c++)
00421                                                 tmp[c] = (float) ((const unsigned char *) srcbuf)[depth*tmpindex+c];
00422                                         }
00423 
00424                                         wsum+= weight[k];
00425 
00426                                         for (c=0; c<depth; c++)
00427                                             acc[c]+= weight[k] * tmp[c];
00428                                     }
00429                                 }
00430                                 k++;
00431                             }
00432                         }
00433 
00434                         if (wsum!=0) {
00435                             for (c=0; c<depth; c++)
00436                                 acc[c]/= wsum;
00437 
00438                             if (is_float) {
00439                                 for (c=0; c<depth; c++)
00440                                     ((float *) dstbuf)[depth*index+c] = acc[c];
00441                             }
00442                             else {
00443                                 for (c=0; c<depth; c++) {
00444                                     ((unsigned char *) dstbuf)[depth*index+c]= acc[c] > 255 ? 255 : (acc[c] < 0 ? 0 : ((unsigned char) (acc[c]+0.5f)));
00445                                 }
00446                             }
00447 
00448                             if (dstmask!=NULL) dstmask[index]=FILTER_MASK_MARGIN;   /* assigned */
00449                             cannot_early_out = 1;
00450                         }
00451                     }
00452                 }
00453             }
00454         }
00455 
00456         /* keep the original buffer up to date. */
00457         memcpy(srcbuf, dstbuf, bsize);
00458         if (dstmask!=NULL) memcpy(srcmask, dstmask, width*height);
00459     }
00460 
00461     /* free memory */
00462     MEM_freeN(dstbuf);
00463     if (dstmask!=NULL) MEM_freeN(dstmask);
00464 }

00466 /* threadsafe version, only recreates existing maps */
00467 void IMB_remakemipmap(ImBuf *ibuf, int use_filter)
00468 {
00469     ImBuf *hbuf = ibuf;
00470     int curmap = 0;
00471     
00472     ibuf->miptot= 1;
00473     
00474     while (curmap < IB_MIPMAP_LEVELS) {
00475         
00476         if (ibuf->mipmap[curmap]) {
00477             
00478             if (use_filter) {
00479                 ImBuf *nbuf= IMB_allocImBuf(hbuf->x, hbuf->y, 32, IB_rect);
00480                 IMB_filterN(nbuf, hbuf);
00481                 imb_onehalf_no_alloc(ibuf->mipmap[curmap], nbuf);
00482                 IMB_freeImBuf(nbuf);
00483             }
00484             else
00485                 imb_onehalf_no_alloc(ibuf->mipmap[curmap], hbuf);
00486         }
00487         
00488         ibuf->miptot= curmap+2;
00489         hbuf= ibuf->mipmap[curmap];
00490         if (hbuf)
00491             hbuf->miplevel= curmap+1;
00492         
00493         if (!hbuf || (hbuf->x <= 2 && hbuf->y <= 2))
00494             break;
00495         
00496         curmap++;
00497     }
00498 }
00499 
00500 /* frees too (if there) and recreates new data */
00501 void IMB_makemipmap(ImBuf *ibuf, int use_filter)
00502 {
00503     ImBuf *hbuf = ibuf;
00504     int curmap = 0;
00505 
00506     imb_freemipmapImBuf(ibuf);
00507     
00508     ibuf->miptot= 1;
00509 
00510     while (curmap < IB_MIPMAP_LEVELS) {
00511         if (use_filter) {
00512             ImBuf *nbuf= IMB_allocImBuf(hbuf->x, hbuf->y, 32, IB_rect);
00513             IMB_filterN(nbuf, hbuf);
00514             ibuf->mipmap[curmap] = IMB_onehalf(nbuf);
00515             IMB_freeImBuf(nbuf);
00516         }
00517         else
00518             ibuf->mipmap[curmap] = IMB_onehalf(hbuf);
00519 
00520         ibuf->miptot= curmap+2;
00521         hbuf= ibuf->mipmap[curmap];
00522         hbuf->miplevel= curmap+1;
00523 
00524         if (hbuf->x <= 2 && hbuf->y <= 2)
00525             break;
00526 
00527         curmap++;
00528     }
00529 }
00530 
00531 ImBuf *IMB_getmipmap(ImBuf *ibuf, int level)
00532 {
00533     CLAMP(level, 0, ibuf->miptot-1);
00534     return (level == 0)? ibuf: ibuf->mipmap[level-1];
00535 }
00536 
00537 void IMB_premultiply_rect(unsigned int *rect, char planes, int w, int h)
00538 {
00539     char *cp;
00540     int x, y, val;
00541 
00542     if (planes == 24) { /* put alpha at 255 */
00543         cp= (char *)(rect);
00544 
00545         for (y=0; y<h; y++)
00546             for (x=0; x<w; x++, cp+=4)
00547                 cp[3]= 255;
00548     }
00549     else {
00550         cp= (char *)(rect);
00551 
00552         for (y=0; y<h; y++) {
00553             for (x=0; x<w; x++, cp+=4) {
00554                 val= cp[3];
00555                 cp[0]= (cp[0]*val)>>8;
00556                 cp[1]= (cp[1]*val)>>8;
00557                 cp[2]= (cp[2]*val)>>8;
00558             }
00559         }
00560     }
00561 }
00562 
00563 void IMB_premultiply_rect_float(float *rect_float, char planes, int w, int h)
00564 {
00565     float val, *cp;
00566     int x, y;
00567 
00568     if (planes==24) {   /* put alpha at 1.0 */
00569         cp= rect_float;
00570 
00571         for (y=0; y<h; y++)
00572             for (x=0; x<w; x++, cp+=4)
00573                 cp[3]= 1.0;
00574     }
00575     else {
00576         cp= rect_float;
00577         for (y=0; y<h; y++) {
00578             for (x=0; x<w; x++, cp+=4) {
00579                 val= cp[3];
00580                 cp[0]= cp[0]*val;
00581                 cp[1]= cp[1]*val;
00582                 cp[2]= cp[2]*val;
00583             }
00584         }
00585     }
00586 
00587 }
00588 
00589 void IMB_premultiply_alpha(ImBuf *ibuf)
00590 {
00591     if (ibuf==NULL)
00592         return;
00593 
00594     if (ibuf->rect)
00595         IMB_premultiply_rect(ibuf->rect, ibuf->planes, ibuf->x, ibuf->y);
00596 
00597     if (ibuf->rect_float)
00598         IMB_premultiply_rect_float(ibuf->rect_float, ibuf->planes, ibuf->x, ibuf->y);
00599 }
